description: Change and view managed rule sets associated with your WAF policy.

commands.name: az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules add
commands.summary: Add a managed rule set to a WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules add --type
                                                   --version
                                                   [--action {Block, Log, Redirect}]
                                                   [--ids]
                                                   [--policy-name]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--subscription]

commands.name: az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules list
commands.summary: Show which managed rule sets are applied to a WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules list --policy-name
                                                    --resource-group

commands.name: az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules remove
commands.summary: Remove a managed rule set from a WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door waf-policy managed-rules remove --type
                                                      [--ids]
                                                      [--policy-name]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]
